TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GeoCoordinateWatcher extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged, class System.Device.Location.IGeoPositionWatcher`1<class System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>, class System.IDisposable
Public Class GeoCoordinateWatcher Implements IDisposable, IGeoPositionWatcher(Of GeoCoordinate), INotifyPropertyChanged
type GeoCoordinateWatcher = class interface IDisposable interface INotifyPropertyChanged interface IGeoPositionWatcher<GeoCoordinate>

summary.span: 提供基于纬度和经度坐标的位置数据。

span.span: Supplies location data that is based on latitude and longitude coordinates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供来自当前位置提供程序的基于坐标的位置数据。The class supplies coordinate-based location data from the current location provider. 根据许多因素（如所有提供程序的数据的生存期和准确性、位置应用程序所请求的准确性以及电源消耗和性能影响），当前位置提供程序在计算机上优先级为最高。与位置提供程序关联。The current location provider is prioritized as the highest on the computer, based on a number of factors, such as the age and accuracy of the data from all providers, the accuracy requested by location applications, and the power consumption and performance impact associated with the location provider. 当前位置提供程序可能会随时间而变化，例如，当 GPS 设备失去其附属信号，并且 Wi-fi 三角化提供程序在计算机上成为最准确的提供程序时。The current location provider might change over time, for instance, when a GPS device loses its satellite signal indoors and a Wi-Fi triangulation provider becomes the most accurate provider on the computer. 若要开始访问位置数据，请创建并调用 ，或启动从当前位置提供程序获取数据。To begin accessing location data, create a and call or to initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider. 可以通过检查属性来确定数据是否可用。 The property can be checked to determine if data is available. 如果数据可用，可以从属性获取该位置一次，或通过处理事件接收连续位置更新。If data is available, you can get the location one time from the property, or receive continuous location updates by handling the event. 、和属性支持，使应用程序可以将数据绑定到这些属性。 The , , and properties support , so that an application can data-bind to these properties. 在 Windows 7 中，如果安装了位置提供程序并能够解析计算机的位置，则所有类都能完全正常运行。In Windows 7, all the classes are fully functional if a location provider is installed and able to resolve the computer's location. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows 7 简易版中，唯一支持的位置提供程序是控制面板中的默认位置提供程序，必须安装外接程序以指定纬度和经度。On Windows 7 Starter Edition, the only supported location provider is the Default Location Provider in Control Panel, and an add-in must be installed to specify latitude and longitude. **注意**在 Windows 7 之前的 Windows 版本中，以下条件适用：**Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply: - 可以创建具有构造函数的所有对象， 但属性将始终具有值。All objects that have constructors can be created, but the property will always have the value . - 由 的属性指示的位置将始终为。The location indicated by the property of will always be . - 不会引发位置事件。No location events will be raised. ## Examples 下面的程序演示如何创建并开始使用初始化超时获取数据。The following program shows how to create a and start acquiring data by using an initialization timeout. 然后，该代码打印位置的坐标（如果已知）。The code then prints the coordinates of the location, if known. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.GetLocationDataSync1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.getlocationdatasync1/cs/getlocationdatasync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.GetLocationDataSync1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.getlocationdatasync1/vb/GetLocationDataSync.vb#1)] 以下程序演示如何通过订阅事件来接收连续位置更新。The following program shows how to receive continuous location updates by subscribing to events. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.GetLocationDataAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.getlocationdataasync/cs/getlocationdataasync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.GetLocationDataAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.getlocationdataasync/vb/GetLocationDataAsync.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double MovementThreshold { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.MovementThreshold : double with get, set

summary.span: 相对于最后一个 事件中的坐标必须移动的距离（以米为单位），移动该距离之后位置提供程序将引发另一个 事件。

span.span: The distance that must be moved, in meters, relative to the coordinate from the last event, before the location provider raises another event.
Distance, in meters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认移动阈值为零，这意味着由当前位置提供程序检测到的位置中的任何更改都会导致属性中的事件和更新。The default movement threshold is zero, which means that any change in location detected by the current location provider causes a event and an update in the property. > [!NOTE] > 移动阈值不保证会按请求的阈值接收事件。The movement threshold does not guarantee that events will be received at the requested threshold. 平台会尝试服从特定移动阈值的请求，但在某些情况下，将不会按请求的阈值引发事件。The platform attempts to honor requests for a particular movement threshold, but in some cases, the events will not be raised at the requested threshold. **注意**在 Windows 7 之前的 Windows 版本中，以下条件适用：**Note** In versions of Windows prior to Windows 7, the following conditions apply: - 可以创建具有构造函数的所有对象， 但属性将始终具有值。All objects that have constructors can be created, but the property will always have the value . - 由 的属性指示的位置将始终为。The location indicated by the property of will always be . - 不会引发位置事件。No location events will be raised. 下图表示位置坐标，即 GPS 设备提供给计算机的位置坐标。The following diagram represents location coordinates that the location provider (for example, a GPS device) supplies to the computer. 在关系图中，P1 表示事件中包含的位置数据，P2、P3 和 P4 表示移动阈值内的点。P1, in the diagram, represents the location data included in a event, and P2, P3, and P4 represent points within the movement threshold. 因此，当位置提供程序提供的数据指示位于这些点（P1、P2、P3 和 P4）的位置时 ，不会引发任何事件，并返回 P1。So when the location provider supplies data indicating a location at those points (P1, P2, P3, and P4), no events are raised, and returns P1. 点 P5 在距离之外，因此在此时会更新，并引发事件。The point P5 is outside of the distance, so at that point, is updated and a event is raised. 说明![MovementThreshold 的关系图]说明(~/add/media/ndp-movementthreshold.png "MovementThreshold 的关系图")![Diagram illustrating MovementThreshold](~/add/media/ndp-movementthreshold.png "Diagram illustrating MovementThreshold")

span.span: Indicates that the latitude or longitude of the location data has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当自上一事件以来移动的距离超过指定的阈值时，才会引发此事件。This event is only raised when the distance moved since the last event exceeds the threshold that is specified by . 传递给事件处理程序的 对象包括包含更新的位置数据的对象。The object passed to the event handler includes the object that contains the updated location data. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理第一个事件。The following example shows how to handle the first event. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.LocationEvent1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.locationevent1/cs/locationevent.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.LocationEvent1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.locationevent1/vb/locationevent.vb#1)]

abstract member Start : unit -> unit override this.Start : unit -> unit

summary.span: 开始从当前位置提供程序获取数据。

span.span: Initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider.

summary.span: 此方法启用 事件并允许访问 属性。

span.span: This method enables events and allows access to the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法将开始从当前位置提供程序获取数据。Calling this method will initiate the acquisition of data from the current location provider. 根据各种因素选择当前位置提供程序，如所有提供程序的数据的期限和准确性、应用程序或应用程序所需的准确性以及与位置提供程序关联的功率消耗和性能影响.The current location provider is selected based on factors such as the age and accuracy of the data from all providers, the accuracy requested by the application or applications, and the power consumption and performance impact associated with the location provider. 当前位置提供程序可能会随时间而变化，例如，当 GPS 设备失去其附属信号，并且 Wi-fi 三角化提供程序在计算机上成为最准确的提供程序时。The current location provider might change over time, for instance, when a GPS device loses its satellite signal indoors and a Wi-Fi triangulation provider becomes the most accurate provider on the computer. 如果调用方法时当前优先顺序的位置提供程序没有数据，它将开始获取数据。If the current prioritized location provider does not have data when the method is called, it will start to acquire data. 如果在数据变为可用时已向客户端授予了权限，则可以同步访问数据，如果正在处理事件，将以异步方式传递数据。If the permissions have been granted to the client when the data becomes available, data can be accessed synchronously, and will be delivered asynchronously if events are being handled. 如果在调用时禁用了 Windows 7 传感器和位置平台， 将立即返回事件，将不会引发事件， 并且的属性返回的位置将包含.If the Windows 7 Sensor and Location platform is disabled when is called, will immediately return, events will not be raised, and the location returned by the property of will contain . 如果当前优先顺序的位置提供程序具有数据，则该提供程序将立即同步使用，如果正在处理事件，将以异步方式提供该提供程序。If the current prioritized location provider does have data, it will be available synchronously immediately, and will be delivered asynchronously if events are being handled. 如果调用应用程序没有访问位置提供程序中的数据的权限，系统会提示用户提供一个对话框，提示用户授予或拒绝权限。If the calling application does not have permissions to access data from a location provider, the user will be prompted with a dialog box to either grant or deny permission. 此对话框将是无模式对话框。The dialog box will be modeless. ## Examples 下面的程序处理调用后发生的第一个位置更新。The following program handles the first location update that occurs after is called. [!code-csharp[System.Device.Location.GetLocationDataUpdateOnce#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.getlocationdataupdateonce/cs/getlocationdataupdateonce.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Device.Location.GetLocationDataUpdateOnce#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/system.device.location.getlocationdataupdateonce/vb/GetLocationDataUpdateOnce.vb#1)]

param.name: suppressPermissionPrompt
param.span: 如果为 ，则禁止显示权限对话框；如果为 ，则显示权限对话框。

span.span: to suppress the permission dialog box; to display the permission dialog box.

param.name: timeout
param.span: 超时前等待位置提供程序启动的时间（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: Time in milliseconds to wait for the location provider to start before timing out.

summary.span: 开始从当前位置提供程序获取数据。

span.span: Initiates the acquisition of data from the current location provider.

summary.span: 此方法同步返回。

span.span: This method returns synchronously.

returns.span: 如果在 指定的时间内开始数据获取，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在指定`timeout`的时间段内阻止执行调用线程。This method blocks execution of the calling thread during the time period specified by `timeout`. 从应用程序的用户界面线程调用时请务必小心。Use caution when calling from the user interface thread of your application. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何调用。The following example demonstrates how to call .
